El señor José Adolfo  vive en un barrio situado  en la parte norte de   Managua, casado, es una persona responsable y trabajadora. Tiene  su propio negocio  se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos, peroles, pailas de aluminio.

 oferta sus productos en los departamento saliendo a las cuatro de la mañana de su casa  y regresando por la noche.
En la casa atiende el negocio su esposa, don José  está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abanicos ,planchas ,licuadora, arroceras ya que son artículos que sus clientes se le están encargando.

Agradece a kiva por los  créditos que se le han otorgado ya que ha crecido su negocio  y con sus ganancias ha mejorado su vivienda.

tiene un excelente cliente, cumplido en sus repago.
texts.en:
José Adolfo lives in a neighbourhood in the north part of Managua and is married. He is a responsible and hardworking person. He has his own business selling plastic products, pots and aluminium pans.

He sells his products all over the region, leaving his home at four in the morning and getting back at night.

His wife works in the business at home. José is requesting a loan to buy fans, irons, a liquidiser, rice cookers, and other articles that his customers are placing orders for from him.

He is grateful to Kiva for the loans they have granted him as he has grown his business and has improved his home with the earnings.

He has an excellent customer base and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: to buy sets of plastic chairs, iron pots and aluminium pans

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Su nombre es Diana, tiene 24 años, es una mujer muy emprendedora y guerrera, que sabe lo que quiere y lucha por conseguirlo.
Tiene un hermoso hijo de 20 meses, el cual se ha convertido en su mano derecha y motor para conseguir cada meta y correr tras cada sueño.
Su esposo es su compañía y su ayuda indispensable para seguir y dar cada paso que ella anhela.
Trabaja muy fuerte para llevar sustento para su familia, es muy feliz y se siente orgullosa, alegre y comprometida viendo como su familia progresa cada día mas.
Tiene una mama hermosa que la apoya en cada paso que da, le enseña que si se puede y que con esfuerzo puede continuar.
Ve esta carrera como un reto, ya que su horizonte es claro, sentirse orgullosa de si, y que su hijo, esposo y familia se sientan orgullosos de ella.
Sueña con terminar de estudiar y tener un buen empleo, con esto lograra su casa propia y recursos económicos mayores.
texts.en:
Diana, 24, is a very enterprising woman and a fighter who knows what she wants and strives to get it.  She has a beautiful 20-month-old child who has become her right hand and her motivation for achieving each goal and chasing after every dream.  Her husband keeps her company; his help is indispensable for her to follow and give way to what she wants.

She works very hard to support her family.  She's very happy and she feels proud and committed to see that her family progresses more every day.  Her beautiful mother supports her every step of the way, teaching her that yes, she can make progress with effort.

She sees this career as a challenge because her goal is clear, to feel proud of herself and for her son, husband, and family to be proud of her.  She dreams of finishing her studies and having a good job.  With this she'll achieve her own house and greater economic resources.

loans.use: to finish her studies in health administration

loans.name: Vicente De Jesus

texts.es: Don vicente de 38 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 13 años su principal siembra es el pepino, vive con su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 7, 12 y 16 años que actualmene estudian, es un hombre trabajador y responsable con las necesidades de su hogar, en la foto se muestra el terreno donde esta empezando hacer su siembra de pepinos, de las ventas de su cosecha logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, Don vicente solicta un credito que le ayude a comprar insumos agricolas como son: semillas, abonos, herbicidas y fungicidas, para poder seguir cultivando sus semillas y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vicente, 38, has made a living in agriculture for 13 years.  His main crop is cucumber.  He lives with his life partner and their three children, ages 7, 12, and 16, who currently attend school.  He's a hardworking and responsible man with regard to the needs of his household.

The photograph shows the land where he's beginning to plant his cucumbers.  He manages to pay his household expenses with the sales from his harvest.

Vicente's requesting a loan that will help him buy agricultural supplies such as seed, soil amendments, herbicide, and fungicide to be able to continue growing his seeds and to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, soil amendments, seed, etc.

loans.name: Sedana Ayu Group

texts.en:
Having succeeded in the previous period, the Sedana Ayu group is proceeding to the next loan. Based on the assessment of MUK, the group received 17,500,000 IDR for group lending and individual persons got 2,500,000 IDR. Because most have been able to increase the pig populations, the current loan will be used to buy food and fix the cages. 

Ni Nengah will use the loan to buy superior piglets and build new cages. She was very pleased with how the effort can be developed. She hopes to become a pig-seller at her village, and will use all the profits to improve the welfare of her family and make her dream come true.

loans.use: to buy superior piglets and build new cages.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.en:
Socorro is 49 years old and lives in Malibay, Pasay City, Philippines. She is married to Abraham who works as a construction worker and they have five children whom God blessed them with. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
Socorro sells bags. This kind of bag is used when you are shopping. It's a big bag where you can put all the items you bought. You can use it several times since it is substantial. This bag is available with different designs that you can choose from and is made of recycled sacks. Aside from selling bags, she also has a variety store and a direct selling business.
Sororro is requesting PHP 15,000 to buy more used sacks. She will also use it to buy grocery items needed in her variety store.
She hopes to expand her business and dreams of giving her children a good and quality education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more used sacks and grocery items needed in her business.

loans.name: Hien

texts.en:
Hien was born in 1962. She has four children who are all adults. They are tailors and doctors. Two of them have their own families. Her husband is a farmer and earns about 2,000,000 VND per month. Hien sells paper bags in a market to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND per month. She has done this job for 10 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,000,000 VND per month.
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to acquire more paper bags to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy more paper bags to sell in the market.

loans.name: Jepun Sari Group

texts.en:
Ni Ketut lives in Baturiti, the middle part of Bali with two of her children are still in school. Ni Ketut helps her husband, who works as a farmer, with the family’s income by running a pig business from her home.
In order to expand the business, Ni Ketut raised capital by joining the group Jepun Sari where she was choosen by other member as the head of the group. She works together with MUK to get business loans for pig farmers.
With the loan of 2,5M IDR per person, Ni Ketut plans to buy 4 piglets which cost 500,000 IDR each and use the rest for feed. Although the price of feed is currently very expensive, Ni Ketut expects the sale of the four pigs at a later time will gain a satisfactory profit and will increase the income of the family and help with her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase 4 piglets and pig feed.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario raises pigs and is a farmer. Aside from agricultural businesses, she is also engaged in sewing as her family’s additional source of income. Sewing is now her primary source of income. Rosario is 58 years of age, happily married to a farmer and blessed with three children. She has been keeping pigs for 41 years.
Rosario would like to achieve continuous growth of her sewing business, so she is asking for a loan of 35,000 PHP. This loan will be uses to buy yards of fabrics, threads and necessary needles. She believes that with this loan amount, she can further develop the quality of dresses she offers to her clients. She knows that this loan will enable her to earn a better income enabling her to improve her way of living and to keep her sewing business moving forward.

loans.use: to buy yards of fabrics, threads and necessary needles for her sewing.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru:
Дилором женщина в возрасте 36 лет, проживает в городе Канибадам. Была  замужем , после развода с супругом с ней остались двое сыновей,которых она одна воспитывает.   Живет с родителями в одном доме. Семья большая, состоит из 7 человек.   Дилором самая старшая дочь в семье.   Дилором успешно закончила школу , затем она поступила  в университет,но не смогла его окончить , так как возникли трудности с оплатой договора за университет. С 2010 года она занимается продажей хозтовароми. Закупает товар она с другого города, ей тяжело так как она имеет маленький опыт в сфере  бизнеса. Но она ни на кого не надеется , так как руки помощи не от кого ждать. 
На сегодняшний день она арендует помещение в центре рынка, но у нее большие планы на будущее. Она хочет приобрести свой магазин, но пока ей это не удается. От своих родных она узнала об  организации  Арванд. Обратилась в Арванд, где ей объяснили все условия получения кредита.  Условия организации Арванд ей понравились и она согласилась получить кредит. 
 На полученный кредит она планирует расширить свой ассортимент хоз товаров и тем самым увеличить семейный доход. Дилором благодарит "Арванд", за то, что финансово помогают и поддерживают людей в трудный период их жизни.
texts.en:
Dilorom is 36 years old and lives in Kanibadam. She is divorced and is raising her two sons alone. Dilorom now lives with her parents and her siblings - it's a big family of seven. She is the oldest daughter and not only graduated with distinction from high school, but also attended university. Unfortunately, she was not able to complete her degree as the family could not afford to pay tuition. Instead, since 2010 Dilorom has been managing a shop that sells household goods. Dilorom purchases her inventory in another city and has had some difficulties managing the store as she does not have much business experience. But she is determined to succeed as she knows there is no one else to rescue her except herself.

Currently Dilorom is renting a stall at the local market, but she has big plans for the future. She wants to purchase her own store, but currently lacks the savings for such a move. Her parents told Dilorom about Arvand/Kiva and she turned to the organization for a loan. She likes the lending terms and conditions for this organization. She is planning to use this loan to expand her inventory and increase profits. Dilorom is thankful to Kiva for financially supporting people during hard time.

loans.use: to purchase household goods for resale

loans.name: Azucenas-32 Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento AZUCENAS-32 está  compuesto por ocho integrantes cinco mujeres y tres  varones,  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Ysabel tiene 24 años y es casada con 2 hijos que son de las edades de 3 y 1 años, ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos chinelas, tiene su puesto de venta en uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Ysabel va a usar este préstamo para la compra se chinelas  por mayor para surtir su puesto de venta, y así de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la compra de mercadería, la Sra. Ysabel enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que hay varias personas que venden zapatos deportivos y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
The Azucenas-32 communal bank is made up of eight members, five women and three men.  The president of the bank is Ysabel, 24.  She's married and has two children, ages 3 and 1.  She makes a living selling mules.  Her sales stall is in one of the busiest markets in the city of Cochabamba.

This loan is her first sequence with the institution.  Ysabel's going to use it to buy mules wholesale to stock her sales stall and increase her working capital.  She's requesting this loan to buy merchandise.

The challenge Ysabel faces in her business is competition, because there are several people who sells athletic shoes.  She's going to use her profits to improve her quality of life.

She's happy about the support granted and grateful to the institution because this is the only job that allows her to support her family.

loans.use: to buy mules wholesale

loans.name: Jose Cupertino

texts.es: Don Jose, tiene 62 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos y vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Intibucá.  El tiene mas de 20 años de dedicarse al cultivo de café, produce café en Oro y lo vende al mercado local. Su finca la ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. Actualmente solicita un préstamo por 25,000 lempiras, siendo este el sexto ciclo con ODEF y le ha ayudado mucho a mejorar el cultivo. Con esta otra inversión va fertilizar de nuevo el cultivo y le dará mantenimiento para seguir sacando buena producción. Su meta es aprender nuevas técnicas de cultivo de café para generar más ingresos y poder ayudar a sus hijos con la educación.
texts.en: Don Jose is 62 years old. He is married, has 4 children and lives in a village in the borough of Intibuca. He has been growing coffee for 20 years, produces coffee at Oro and sells it at the local market. He has been able to work his land thanks to a number of different loans. At this time, he requests a loan of $1300; he was granted and paid back 6 loans through ODEF, which helped him greatly improve the coffee plantation. He intends to use the new loan to fertilize the coffee plants and to care for the plantation so he can continue to have a good output. His goal is to learn new techniques to grow coffee so he can obtain more revenue and thus help pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor for the upkeep of his coffee plantation

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong was born in 1971. She has two sons. The older son has his own family. The younger son is learning at secondary school. Her husband is a farmer. He earns about 2,000,000 VND per month. Huong sells fish to earn a living. Her income is about 4,000,000 VND. She has done this job for 15 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to sell fish in the market. She wants to use her profit to build her house.

loans.use: to sell fish in the market.

loans.name: Amarjargal

texts.en: Ms. Amarjargal is a 50-year-old widow who lives with her daughter and niece in an apartment in the Zavhan province of Mongolia. Her daughter stays home taking care of her baby daughter Bayarjavhlan, aged 2. Amarjargal has been a herder for the years after her husband passed away. She has now moved to the province center with her daughter and niece. She is now requesting 1,000,000 MNT to start her shoe repair business at home and purchase starting inventory for it. She is hardworking, diligent and a responsible woman.

loans.use: to start her own shoe repair business at home and purchase starting inventory for it.

loans.name: Ty

texts.en:
Ty was born in 1965. She has two sons who are workers. She is wise. 

Ty sells breakfast meals to earn a living. She has done this job for 10 years. She earns about 3,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month.
 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle, she borrowed 7,194,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,502,000 VND to buy ingredients, tables, and chairs for her breakfast food stall in the market.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, tables, and chairs for her breakfast food stall in the market.

loans.name: Amarsaihan

texts.en:
Amarsaihan is a 44-year-old widow who lives with her 2 daughters in a ger in the Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. Her daughters Narantsetseg, age 22, and Naigalmaa, age 25, are university students. 

The borrower has been providing services selling traditional caps by order at home. She also purchases livestock intestines and produces organic packaging for meat producers. She is a hardworking, enthusiastic, and friendly woman.

She is now requesting a loan of 1,600,000 MNT to purchase large amounts of livestock intestines to produce organic packaging and sell to local companies.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of livestock intestines to produce organic packaging and sell to local companies.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca has run her hog raising business for more than ten years. She is thankful because with her previous loan she was able to supply her hogs with proper nutrition which makes her hogs healthier. With her increased income, she was able to cover all of her household expenditures and pay back her previous loan from lenders.
Rebecca plans to buy stock of livestock feed, vitamins and vaccines but she struggles for shortage of capital due to the large number of hogs she raises. For these reasons, she is asking for a loan of PHP 35,000. She hopes that lenders will approve her requested loan so she can make her livestock business a stable source of income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock of livestock feed, vitamins and vaccines to ensure proper growth and nutrition of her hogs.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
This is Norma. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy the needed grocery items for her variety store. The loan also helped in her family and her child's education. She and her husband are working hard to provide income for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and child’s education expense. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Norma dreams that her variety store will be a grocery store and dreams that her child will finish his studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan was born in 1964. She has two children. Her daughter is in school at university. Her son is in high school. Her husband is a guard and earns about 4,000,000 VND per month. Lan sells groceries to earn a living. Her income is about 4,000,000 VND per month. She has done this job for 5 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 6,758,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,066,000 VND to buy biscuits, candies and canned food to sell in her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, candies and canned food to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jocelyn is 40 years old and has one child who is in school.

Jocelyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 50000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like shampoo, canned goods, noodles, snack foods, etc.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 10 years. Jocelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her sari-sari (convenience) store like shampoo, canned goods, noodles, snack foods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Baigalmaa

texts.en:
Ms. Baigalmaa is a 34-year-old married woman who has three children and lives with her family in Darkhan city, Mongolia. Darkhan is the second largest city of Mongolia and Transcapital's new branch was opened here in January 2013. The family lives in a ger, a traditional Mongolian felt tent, in the outer ger district of the city. Her two daughters attend high school and her son attends kindergarten.
Baigalmaa supports her family by operating a retail stall at the local market in the city. She really appreciates this Kiva loan and she hopes she can make a larger profit with the special help of this Kiva loan. She is requesting a 2.000.000 MNT loan to purchase a variety of products for the upcoming season.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products for her retail stall for the upcoming summer season.

loans.name: Otgonjargal

texts.en:
Otgonjargal is 57 years old and lives with her husband and daughter in a small house in the Orhon province of Mongolia. 

Her husband Otgon, age 57, helps his wife to run their family grocery store business. Her daughter Oyuntuya, age 34, works at a local company. 

The borrower has been running a business selling clothes in a rental counter of a local market since 1998. She started her grocery store business near her home in 2011. 

Otgonjargal is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to insulate and install vacuum windows in her store in order to reduce heat loss and stay warm during the winter and to also expand her clothing business along with her grocery store. She is a hardworking, positive, and enthusiastic woman.

loans.use: to insulate and install vacuum windows in her store in order to reduce heat loss and stay warm during winter and to also expand her clothing business along with her grocery store.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a 32-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For nine years she has been a social worker at the municipal council and was inspired by the fact that she likes working and helping the poor. She plans of upgrading her studies and also educating her children to attain degrees at a minimum despite challenges in inadequate savings. Annet is requesting a loan to pay school fees for herself.

loans.use: to pay school fees for herself.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима добросовестная и порядочная женщина. Ей 53 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Фотима вместе семьей живет в сельской местности и имеет хорошее условие для скотоводства. Фотима хочет организовать свой бизнес купле продажей скота. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Ее невестка будет помогать ей введение бизнеса. Она купила скот для организации бизнеса, но не имеет корм для откармливания скота. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4500 сомони для покупки корма для скота. Этот займ поможет ей развевать новый бизнес и таким образом получить больше дохода для улучшения условия проживания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Fotima is a conscientious and proper woman. She is 53 years old. She is married and has raised four children. Her children are all adults now. Fotima lives in the rural area with her family where conditions are good for raising cattle. She wants to organize her own livestock business and has takes a class "Achieve Success" with the Association of Business Women and earned her certificate. Fotima's daughter-in-law will help her manage the livestock. Fotima purchased some animals for her herd, but lacks the funds to purchase feed for them. She is requesting this loan of 4500 somoni to purchase hey for her animals. This loan will help her expand her business and be able to earn higher profits. Fotima is hoping for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy feed for cattle for running anew business

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба очень успешная и добросовестная женщина. Ей 27 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж простой рабочий и получает маленькую зарплату. Она должна справляться со всеми своими расходами сама. Она работает на местной больнице медсестрой и ее зарплата не хватает для улучшения условия проживания. Она планирует организовать свой бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания, так как она живет в сельской местности, она надеется, что этот тип бизнеса очень эффективный, так как конкуренция не большая. Ее соседи очень обрадовались, когда узнали об ее плане, организовать бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания, так как основными покупателями будут ее соседи. Она будет продавать высококачественные продукты питания на местном рынке. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mahbuba is a successful and conscientious woman. She is 27 years old, married and is raising 2 children. Her husband is a day worker and earns little and Mahbuba has to provide for many household expenses on her own. She works in the local hospital as a nurse and also earns a tiny salary. So Mahbuba has decided to organize her own grocery store business. Since she lives in a rural area, she expects that her business will take off as there is little competition. Her neighbors are all very happy to know she is starting a grocery store, so she expects them to be regular customers. She will be selling high quality groceries at the local market. To prepare herself Mahbuba attended a class "Achieve Success" organized by the Association of Businesswomen and received her certificate. She is requesting a loan of 1000 somoni to purchase the first batch of groceries for resale. Mahbuba hopes for your kindness!

loans.use: to buy food items for organizing new business

loans.name: Nuriddinkhon

texts.ru: Нуриддинхон холостой молодой человек. Ему 25 лет. Он живет в районе Дж.Руми в южной части Таджикистана. Нуриддинхон занимается растениеводством. Одновременно он хочет начать новый бизнес. Его интересует животноводство, а именно купля-продажа мелкорогатого скота, так как это прибыльное дело и не требует тяжелой работы. К тому же у Нуриддинхон есть хороший сарай для содержания скота. Кредит берет для закупа мелкорогатого скота и его корма. Прибыль с деятельности Нуриддинхон хочет истратить на свадьбу своей младшей сестры.
texts.en: Nuriddinkhon is a single man. He is 25 years old and lives in J. Rumy in south Tajikistan. Nuriddinkhon is a farmer but wants to expand into livestock sales as well. He is planning to start a sheep herd for future resale at the meat market, as it is a lucrative business and does not require hard work or much time. Besides, Nuriddinkhon has a good barn for keeping the sheep. He is taking out this loan to purchase a few animals and feed for them. Nuriddinkhon  will use the profits from this venture to finance his little sister's wedding celebration.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and feed for them

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан женат и отец одного ребенка. Ему 31 год. Он со своей семьей проживает в районе Дж.Руми, расположенный в южной части Таджикистана. Хасан имеет намерение начать новый бизнес. Для этого он выбрал сферу животноводства. Он хочет заняться куплей и продажей овец. Для содержания скота у него при дворе имеется сарай. С этим намерением Хасан запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи мелкорогатого скота. За счет прибыли Хасан хочет провести торжество по случаю обрезания сына.
texts.en: Hasan is 31 years old, married and a father of one child. He lives with his family in J. Rumy in southern part of Tajikistan. Hasan wants to start his own business as a sheep herder. He already owns a good barn for the animals and is planning to raise and fatten the sheep for future resale at the meat market. He is planning to use the profits to finance his son's circumcision ceremony.

loans.use: to buy sheep for future resale

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.ru: Мухаё Женщина, которая любит трудиться. Она живет вместе семьей на севере Таджикистана и считает себя счастливой женщиной, так как она замужем на хорошего человека и имеет 3 детей. Мухаё 34 года. Она имеет среднее образование. После окончания средней школы она начала работать и зарабатывать на жизнь. Таким образом, она помогала родителям. После замужества она продолжала работу. Итак, Мухаё более 15 лет работает в швейной фабрике. Она занимается глажкой готовой продукции. Мухаё очень честно выполняет свою работу. Ее начальники довольны ею. Она живет в очень старом доме и начала стройку нового дома. Она мечтает достроить дом для своих детей и женить их на новом доме. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 8700 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, кирпич и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhayo is a woman who likes to work.  She lives with her family in the north of Tajikistan and considers herself a lucky woman as she is married to a good man and has 3 children.  Muhayo is 34 years old.  She has a high school education.  After finishing high school she started working and earning a living.  This way she helped her parents.  After getting married she continued to work.  Muhayo has been working at a sewing factory for over 15 years.  She irons finished products.  Muhayo is very responsible at her job.  Her managers are happy with her.  She lives in a very old house and started building a new house.  She dreams of finishing the house and have her children marry at the new house.  She is asking for a loan of 8,700 somoni for the purchase of building materials such as cement, bricks, etc.  She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks and cement to build a new house

loans.name: Dilyob

texts.ru: Дилёб молодой парень в возрасте 22 лет. Он не женат, живет с родителями.  Дилёб очень весёлый, энергичный парень. Пока он не хочет жениться, он хочет сначала сам встать на ноги, накопить денег на свадьбу, купить машину и создать условия для молодоженов а потом уже жениться.  Дилёб занимается видео монтажом. Этим делом он занимается четыре года. Он снимает на видео разные мероприятия а затем делает монтаж этих съемок. Этот бизнес очень актуальный и дает хороший доход.  Дилёб накопил денежные средства но пока ему не хватает на авто и он решил подать заявку на кредит.   Он обратился в Арванд и надеется, что его поддержат и помогут ему в осуществлении его планов.
texts.en: Dilyob is a young 22 year old man.  He is not married and lives with his parents.  Dilyob is a very happy, energetic young man.  For now he does not want to get married, he would like to first get established, save money for a wedding and set up proper conditions for newlyweds and then get married.  Dilyob does video editing.  He has been in this business for four years.  He films different events and then creates movies.  This is a very timely business and makes a good profit.  Dilyob has saved up money but does not have enough for a car and has decided to apply for a loan.  He turned to Arvand and hopes that he will be supported and lenders will help him to realize his plans.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Norma Verónica

texts.es:
La señora Norma Verónica, es madre soltera de cinco hijos, labora como enfermera en un centro hospitario de la  ciudad de León desde hace 25 años, en horario de 7:00 am y finaliza a 3:00 pm de lunes a viernes,  Ella  realiza este tipo de trabajo para la mantención de su familia. 

La señora Norma se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar apoyo con un  crédito  para gastos medico  como consulta y medicamentos para recuperación inmediata de su salud.
texts.en:
Norma Verónica is a single mother of five children. She has worked as a nurse in a hospital in the city of Leon for 25 years. Her schedule is from 7:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. Monday through Friday. She does this type of work to support her family.
Norma approached Ceprodel to ask for help with a loan for medical expenses, such as doctor visits and medications for the immediate recovery of her health.

loans.use: Gastos Medicos

loans.name: Francisco Reynaldo

texts.es: El Sr. Francisco tiene 31 años el se dedica a la confección de enaguas para mujeres de pollera, el se dedica a esta actividad hace ya varios años, su taller se encuentran ubicado en la zona de Alto Lima, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Francisco utilizara este préstamo para compra te telas por rollo para la confección de sus enaguas, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital de trabajo, El Sr. Francisco enfrenta retos en su negocio que son seguir mejorando la calidad de la confección de las prendas de vestir y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir aumentando  su  capital de trabajo su deseo para su negocio es crecer y confeccionar variedad de prendas de vestir, El Sr. Francisco se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Francisco is 31 years old. He earns his living making petticoats for women's skirts, which he has done for several years. His workshop is located in the Alto Lima area and this is his first loan cycle within the institution. 

Francisco will use this loan to purchase bolts of fabric for making his petticoats. He is requesting the loan because he lacks working capital. Francisco faces challenges in his business like continuing to improve the construction quality of his garments. He is going to use his profits to continue increasing his working capital. His wish for his business is to grow and make a variety of garments. 

Francisco feels grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for making petticoats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a laminated roof

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheets and purlins.

loans.name: Baasanjav

texts.en: Mrs. Baasanjav is a 57 year old widow who lives with her son in a ger (a traditional Mongolian hut) in the Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. Her son Temuulen, age 15, is a secondary school student. The borrower started a butcher shop business at a rental counter of the local market in 2000. She purchase intestines and other meat products from herders in order to produce organic meat products and sell to local customers. She is a hardworking, well-experienced and welcoming woman. She is requesting 1,000,000MNT to purchase a large amount of meat to produce organic meat products.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of meat to produce organic meat products to sell to local customers

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Teresita is 45 years old and has one child, who is in school.

Teresita has a buy and sell ready to wear and Avon products business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 30000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of ready to wear and Avon products to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her child to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of ready to wear and Avon products to sell

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
This is Marlyn. Her previous loan helped her a lot in her business. She was able to buy more merchandise products for her direct selling business, thus generating more income. She has been in this business for five years now. She has also been a jeepney operator for ten years now. She and her husband are working hard to provide income for their everyday needs. 

She would like to apply for another 32,000 PHP for her to buy more merchandise items and products to increase her product inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marlyn hopes for a continuous growth in her business and dreams that her whole family including her grandchildren will have a beautiful life. She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for merchandise items and products to sell in her business.

loans.name: Akpar

texts.ru: Акпар, человек с открытой душой. Он всю жизнь трудится упорно и зарабатывает деньги для обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Акпару очень повезло с женой. Его жена добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она занимается услугой швеи. Акпар имеет 4 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Двое старшие дочери замужем и имеют  детей. Акпар занимается услугой перевозки людей по городу. Он занимается этим делом более 31 года. Он очень общительный и вежливый человек, и поэтому все его пассажиры довольные. Акпар тратит все свои деньги для покупки продуктов питания и других нужных средства для проживания. Акпар данное время не имеет средства для проведения свадебного торжества своих 2 сыновей. Его сыновья хотят жениться и поэтому попросили отца проводить их свадебное торжество. Акпар запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества своих сыновей. Этот займ поможет ему осуществить мечту его сыновей. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Akpar is a man with a generous soul. All his life he has been working hard and earning money to provide for his family. He got very lucky with his wife - she is a kind and hard working woman who works as a seamstress. Akpar has four adult children. His two oldest daughters are married and have children themselves. His two sons also want to get married, and asked their father to pay for the celebration, but Akpar has no savings for wedding expenses. He works as a taxi driver and has been successful in it for 31 years - he is a talkative and polite man and his clients are always pleased. But Akpar uses all the income from the taxi business to buy groceries and other household necessities for his family. Akpar is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni from Kiva to pay for his sons' weddings. He hopes for your generosity.

loans.use: to have a wedding party for his two sons

loans.name: Sultonboy

texts.ru: Султонбой веселый и жизнерадостный человек. Он женат на прекрасной женщине, которую зовут Зайнура. Они имеют двоих замечательных детей. Султонбой занимается купле продажей скота более 6 лет. Султонбой хорошо знает все тонкости своего дела и с легкостью справляется с бизнесом. Он продает свой скот на местном рынке и имеет своих клиентов. Султонбой и его семья живут в старом доме, который остался от его отца. Султонбой планирует построить новый дом. Данное время его дом имеет очень плохое состояние. Все окна разбиты и зимой, поэтому очень холодно. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов, как цемент, древесина, песок и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sultonboy is a happy and optimistic man. He is married to a wonderful woman named Zaynura and they have two great children. Sultonboy has been raising cattle for six years and knows all the finer points of the trade. He sells cattle at the local market and has many regular clients. However, Sulotonboy's family lives in a very old house which they inherited from his father. Most of the windows in the house are cracked and it's very cold in winter. To replace the house Sultonboy is planning to build a new one himself. He is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to purchase building supplies such as cement, lumber, sand etc. Sultonboy hopes for your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, lumber, sand for building a house

loans.name: Ines Alfredo

texts.es: Don Alfredo tiene desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en casa propia. En su tienda tiene varios productos como granos basicos, golosinas y otro tipo de producto que son de la necesidad del cliente, Don Alfredo esta solictando un credito para poder surtir con mas productos su pequeña tienda ya que con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar y no le alcanza para poder surtirla y asi poder tener mas clientela y obtener mejores ganacias para  darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
For several years, Alfredo has had a small shop in his place of residence. He lives with his wife and his two children in his own house. 

In his shop, Alfredo has various products like staple foods, snacks, and other kinds of products that his customers need. Alfredo is requesting a loan to be able to stock his little store with more products; the money he makes covers his household costs, but he can't afford to stock the store, which would allow him to have more customers and earn more money to give his family improved economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase products for his shop.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La Sra.  Rosa tiene 59 años tiene un hijo que tiene la edad de veinte años, que estudia en la universidad,  ella se dedica a la venta de dulces y golosinas en un puesto de venta que se encuentran ubicada en la zona de Chasquipampa, Este préstamo es su séptima secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. rosa utilizara  este préstamo para compra de un anaquel donde pueda vender sus productos ya que se acerca la época de frio y esto le perjudica en la venta ya que en algunos caso no sale a vender, pero ya tendrá un puesto donde evitara un poco que le haga mucho frio,  la razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra.  Rosa enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, ella va a utilizar los beneficios en ahorrar para la compra de una casa ya que donde vive se encuentra en alquiler y ese es su deseo poder tener una casita para brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Rosa, 59, has a 20-year-old son who is studying at university. She makes her living selling sweets and candy in a stall located in the area of Chasquipampa.

This loan is her seventh with this communal bank, Rosa will use the loan to buy a shelf where she can sell her products as the cold season is approaching and this affects her sales as she sometimes doesn't go out to sell, but she will soon have a stall where she can be a little sheltered from the cold. The reason she is seeking this loan is due to a lack of working capital. 

Rosa faces challenges in her business such as competition. She will use the profits she makes to save up and buy a home as she is currently renting and she dreams of having a small house to make life a little more comfortable for her family. Rosa is happy and grateful to the communal bank for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy a shelf.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es: Doña Ana de 55 años de edad tiene desde hace varios años un negocio de venta de tortillas en su lugar de residencia, ella elabora las tortillas de maiz asi como lo muestra la fotografia, tiene mucha clientela pues es un alimento que se vende todos los dias 3 veces al dia, con las ganacias que obtiene ha podido salir adelante con su familia, vive en casa propia con su esposo y un hijo de 18 años quienes tambien aportan para los gastos del hogar, Doña Ana esta solicitando un credito que le permita comprar mas maiz y otras cosas que se necesita para la elaboracion de sus totillas y asi poder obtener mejores ganacias ya que es su unica fuente de trabajo, para poderle seguir dando a su familia lo que necesita.
texts.en:
Ana, 55, has been running a business selling tortillas from her home for several years now. She makes corn tortillas as you can see in the photograph. She has a healthy customer base as it is a foodstuff that is sold every day, three times a day. With the profits from the business, Ana has been able to get ahead in life with her family. She lives in her own home with her husband and an 18-year-old son who also help with the household costs.

Ana is seeking a loan to buy more corn and other items she needs to make her tortillas to gain more profits as this is her sole source of income to continue to give her family what it needs.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en:
Gerry is 43 years old and has two school-aged children. He is engaged in farming; this is the only way to make living. He is a hardworking person; early in the morning he visits his farm to make sure that his business is going well. 

He is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farm.

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Ligaya works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.  Ligaya is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase foods and household goods, such as snack foods, soft drinks, eggs, shampoo, soap, etc., to sell for her general store business.

Ligaya has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase foods and household goods such as snack foods, soft drinks, eggs, shampoo, soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Jhunry

texts.en: Jhunry is 27 and single. He lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a bakery shop to earn a living. He has been in this business for over 3 years and earns 5,000 PHP every month. He has been a member in GDMPC since the year 2011, and now he has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase additional ingredients for bread making. He hopes and dreams to save for the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for bread making

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a 59-year-old married woman from Carlos P. Garcia, Bohol. She has two grown sons. 

She operates a sari-sari or variety store business. She has been in this business for thirteen years now. The store is the source of her income. She earns 9000 PHP a month. Her husband is a fisherman.

Wilma is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, rice, canned goods, noodles, toiletries, and food snacks. These items will help her to earn more profit. With the help of this loan, she can buy things that she needs for her business. In the future, Wilma hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, rice, canned goods, noodles, toiletries, and food snacks.

loans.name: Joecy

texts.en:
Joecy is 41 years old, married, and has four children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for four years, and she earns additional income by farming sugarcane.

Joecy is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional feed for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Van

texts.en:
Van, born in 1966, is the mother of two adult sons. Her husband, a farmer, has been sick for months and can't earn money for his family. For 20 years Van has been working to support her family by raising chickens and growing rice, earning a monthly income of about 2,500,000 VND. Her family’s total earnings are about 4,000,000 VND per month.

Van has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. Her previous loan of 6,758,000 VND was repaid on time. She is now requesting a new loan for 8,066,000 VND to buy feed for her chickens, and intends to use her profit to enlarge her poultry operation.

loans.use: to buy feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Eseza

texts.en:
Eseza, a 28-year-old married mother of one living in Kasese, Uganda, has been a police officer for five years. She was inspired into service by her desire to maintain law and order, and she is so proud of her job despite the low salary that it comes with.

Eseza is requesting this loan to buy cows for milk production. Her dreams are to educate her child and establish a farm.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Karine

texts.ru:
Карине в 1998 году открыла свой собственный бизнес. Она начала с маленького арендованного прилавка в городе Капан , где стала перепродавать офисные и школьные принадлежности. После тяжкого труда и работы Карине через много лет в 2011году смогла купить и построить маленькую книжную лавочку в Капане.   
Каждый месяц Карине покупает из оптовых рынках Еревана книги, офисные и школьные принадлежности, рамки для фото, плюшевые игрушки для детей ит.д. и привозит в Капан для продажи в своем магазине. У Карине кроме всего всегда на продаже есть новые книги современных авторов, по этому у ее книжного магазина хорошая репутация и много постоянных клиентов и в Капане и с соседних городов и сел в Сюникской области. 
Карине 50 лет и не замужем. Она родилась и живет в городе Капан вместе с братом и матерью. Мать Карине пенсионерка и Карине после работы заботится также о больной матери. 
Карине нуждается в кредите на сумму 500.000 Армянских драм для покупки новой партии книг, журналов, школьный и офисных  принадлежностей для своего книжного магазина .
texts.en:
Karine opened her store in 1998. She started by renting a small market stall in Kapan where she sold office and school supplies. After a lot of hard work Karine was able to purchase her own store in 2011. Every month Karine travels to Yerevan to purchase batches of books, office and school supplies, as well as photo frames and stuffed toys which she transports to Kapan for resale in her store. She pays particular attention to have new books by popular authors, so her store has a good reputation and many regular clients in Kapan and surrounding towns and villages of the Syunik region. Karine is 50 years old and single. She was born and lives in Kapan together with her mother and brother. Karin's mother is retired and after work Karine also takes care of her sick mother. 

Karine is applying for a loan of 500,000 Armenian drahm to finance a whole sale purchase of book, magazines and office supplies for her book store.

loans.use: To buy a new batch of books, magazines, school and office supplies for her bookstore

loans.name: Maksudjon

texts.ru: Дом, где живет  Максудчон и его семья  не отвечает стандартам жилья и он срочно должен отремонтировать свой дом. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Двое из его детей совершеннолетние, а двое еще несовершеннолетние, то есть они учатся в средней школе и всегда просят родителей отремонтировать их дом, но их доход от скотоводства не достаточно для этого. Он более 15 лет занимается скотоводством, и его заботливая жена помогает ему введение бизнеса. Он должен отремонтировать все комнаты, а также фасад дома, так как его дом большой и нуждается в капитальном ремонте. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов, цемент, песок, древесина и т.п. для ремонта дома. Максудчон и его дети ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: The house where Maksudjon and his family live no longer meets living standards and he has to urgently perform repairs. He must fix all the rooms in his house as well as the exterior, as his house is large and requires a major renovation. Maksudjon is married and has four children - two are adults and the other two are still attending high school and constantly asking parents to repair the house. Unfortunately, Maksudjon's cattle business does not provide enough income to finance such a big expenditure at once.  He has been raising livestock for 15 years and his caring wife always helped him with this business. To pay for house repairs Maksudjon is requesting a loan of 3000 US dollars which he will use to purchase construction supplies such as cement, sand, lumber etc. Maksudjon and his children are really counting on your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, wood and etc for house repair

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Maritza del Carmen vive en la cuidad de managua, tiene dos hijos que están en edad escolar trabaja  comercializando carne de res y cerdo en un mercado de la capital.

doña Maritza esta solicitando un crédito  para la inversión de compra de carne de res y cerdo para ofertar  a sus clientes  para mejorar sus ganancia  para ayudar a su familia ya que  su ganancia son sus únicos ingresos en el hogar.

doña Maritza manifiesta que ella esta muy agradecida con creprodel y kiva, ya que primeramente su madre que en paz descanse era la que trabajaba el negocio iniciando con prestamos y luego  ella siguió trabajando con financiamiento demostrando ser un excelente cliente en sus repago. y ha logrado mantener su negocio.
texts.en:
Maritza del Carmen lives in the city of Managua, has two children who are of school age, and works selling beef and pork at a market in the capital.

Maritza is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of beef and pork to offer to her customers so she can improve her earnings and help her family, since hers is the only household income they have.

Maritza says that she is very grateful to Creprodel and Kiva, as at first her mother (may she rest in peace) worked in the business, starting out with loans. Then later, she kept working with financing, proving to have an excellent record of repayment and managing to maintain her business.

loans.use: to buy beef and pork.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: Roxana, de 29 años de edad , esta casada con Denis  con quien tiene 1 hijo de 6 años , juntos viven en su casa propia. Roxana se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y accesorios femeninos como perfumes, cremas corporales, lapiz labial, cremas de manos, aretes, collares y pulseras. Toda su mercadería es enviada en grandes paquetes desde otra ciudad. Todos los días ella va en busca de sus clientes por las calles de su localidad ofreciendo sus productos al crédito o al contado ya que la cobranza lo realiza en forma diaria, semanal o quincenal. Realiza este oficio cerca de 4 años y algunas veces recibe el apoyo de su esposo quien tiene un vehículo el cual usa para trasladar su mercadería. Se siente muy satisfecha por lo bien que le va en ésta nueva etapa.Le gusta mucho tener este trabajo porque le permite disponer de su tiempo ya que durante las horas que no está trabajando puede realizar otras labores de su hogar con mucha comodidad, además a aprendido a ganarse el respeto y la confianza de los clientes en base a su buen trato y su gran sonrisa, tiene buenas ventas y como resultado de ello obtiene buenas ganancias, ahora espera seguir creciendo y más adelante  conseguir un puesto de ventas para exhibir sus productos con mayor tranquilidad. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles para la compra de cosméticos y accesorios como perfumes, cremas faciales y aretes.
texts.en:
Roxana, 29, is married to Denis with whom she has a 6-year-old son, they live together in their own home. Roxana makes her living selling cosmetics and women's accessories such as perfume, body cream, lipsticks, hand cream, earrings, necklaces and bracelets. All of her merchandise is sent in large packets from another city. Every day, Roxana seeks customers in the streets of her area, offering her products on credit or in cash as she takes payments either daily, weekly or every two weeks. She has been performing this job for four years and sometimes she gets help from her husband who has a car to transport her merchandise. 

Roxana feels very satisfied with how this new step in life is going. She very much likes this type of work as it enables her to make the most of her time, during the hours in which she isn't working, she can carry out other tasks in the household easily. She has also learned to win over her customers' trust and respect through her good customer service and her wonderful smile. She has strong sales and as a result of this she earns good profits. Roxana now hopes to continue growing and in the future acquire a sales area to exhibit her products more easily. On this occasion, Roxana is seeking 800 Peruvian Nuevos Soles to buy cosmetics and accessories such as perfume, face cream and earrings.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfumes, talc and more.

loans.name: Silverio

texts.es: El Sr. Silverio tiene 56 años,  el   se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa, yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Espejo,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El Sr. Silverio va a utilizar  este préstamo en la  compra de semillas para  la siembra de papa y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, El Sr. Silverio enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la su calidad de vida El Sr. Silverio es una persona  responsable y trabajadora se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Silverio is 56 years old, he makes his living in farming, sowing a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, yucca and corn in his plot of land located in the community of Espejo. 

This is his first loan cycle with this communal bank, Silverio will use this loan to buy seeds to sow potatoes, which involves preparing the land. The reason he is seeking this loan is to have the financial resources to sower and be able to subsist. Silverio faces challenges in his business such as poor weather which ruin his crops on many an occasion. He will use the profits to improve his quality of life. Silverio is a very responsible and hardworking person and is grateful to the communal bank for the support given.

loans.use: to buy seeds to sow potatoes.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza, tiene 42 años de edad , es soltera y madres de 2 hijos, vive en una casa alquilada en donde lucha día a día para salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.Maritza se dedica a la confección, refacciones y venta de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, ella se encarga de diseñar sus propios modelos y ofrecerlos a la venta en su pequeño local, aunque algunas veces vende algunas prendas que compra de otras ciudades al por mayor, su público confía en ella ya que su paciencia y su pasión por cada uno de los detalles hace que su trabajo sea de calidad. Lleva en este trabajo un promedio de 25 años y siempre lo ha hecho sola. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, aunque algunas veces ha sentido que no podía continuar porque pensaba que no podía crear algún diseño, por eso empezó a tomar cursos de capacitación en moda y eso le ayudó a crear nuevas prendas, con el tiempo pudo superar éste temor y ahora es una excelente costura, espera mas adelante establecer un taller de costura y ser reconocida en todo el País.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados , por otro lado se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual .Con el monto solicitado comprará hilos y telas al por mayor, para continuar con su trabajo de confección.
texts.en:
Maritza is 42 years old. She is single and has 2 children. She lives in a house she rents, where she fights every day to get ahead and improve her family's living conditions. Maritza works in tailoring : she makes and repairs clothes for women, men and children. She designs her own patterns and sells them in her small shop; she occasionally also sells clothes she buys wholesale in other cities. 
Her customers trust her as her patience, passion for her work, and attention to detail allow her to create quality work. She has been a seamstress for about 25 years and has always worked by herself. She really enjoys her work, although she has at times felt unable to continue as she thought she could not come up with new designs; as a result, she took courses in fashion design which helped her create new clothes. With time, she was able to conquer her fears and today is an excellent seamstress. She hopes to set up a tailoring workshop and become known throughout the country. At this time, she requests $600 to buy yarns and fabrics wholesale, so she can continue working on tailoring clothes. She is grateful to every person who makes it possible for her to continue to do her work even better, and she commits to paying her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy yarns and fabrics wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Yesenia

texts.es: Maria de 30 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de calzado vende principalmente sandalias, pues es un calzado que se vende con mas facilidad tiene mucha clientela ya que su puesto de trabajo lo tiene ubicado en un lugar muy estrategico, es un lugar de mucho flujo de personas, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 7 y 10 años que actualmente estudian primero y cuarto grado, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo han podido salir adelante en su hogar, Maria esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar mas mercaderia ya que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios que le ayuden para poder surtir el negocio con mas estilos de sandalias y asi ella pueda tener mejores ganancias y seguirle dando a sus hijos lo que necesitan sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old and has been working for several years selling footwear.  She mainly sells sandals since it is a shoe that sells more easily.  She has a lot of customers because her stall is located in a very strategic area with a high flow of people.

Maria lives with her husband and their two children, aged 7 and 10 years, who are currently in first and fourth grade.  With the profits that she is getting, and with the help of her husband, they have been able to manage at home.  Maria is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise as she has no other cash income to help her stock the business with more styles of sandals.  Then she can have better profits and keep giving her kids what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy sandals

loans.name: Antony

texts.en:
Antony is 38 years old and married with two children. He has been running his business for a period of about five years with an income of KES. 20,000 a month.

This is Antony’s third loan from KADET LTD, and he wants to buy wheat flour in bulk for the bakery work. He hopes to own a bigger bakery in future.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour in bulk.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is a married lady, aged 33 and blessed with four children. They are aged between 12 years and nine months. She owns a retail shop, which has been in operation for a period of one year, earning a monthly income of KES. 10,000.

She has asked for a loan of KES 30,000 with KADET LTD. She wishes to use this amount to purchase inventory for her shop, such as sugar, tea leaves, and wheat and maize flours. 

The revenue she earns will be used to repay the loan.  Her dream is to be successful and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase stock of items such as sugar, tea leaves, biscuits, and wheat and maize flours

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is lady of forty-two years old, married to Michael, and a mother of two children. She sells fruit and  she has been in this business for seven years now and gets a monthly income of thirty thousand shillings.

This will be Margaret's first loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy different types of fruits. In future she wants to feed and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase different types of fruits

loans.name: Duo La Bonita Group

texts.es:
Dúo La bonita, Vicenta es originaria de Sumpango, casada y madres de familia, doña Vicenta es la representante del dúo, es madre de 5 hijos todos ya mayores de edad, ella se dedica a vender refacciones y tortillas en una fábrica que se encuentra a unos kilómetros de su casa,tambien vende ropa nueva en su casa todas las mañana se levanta desde las tres de la mañana para poder empezar a prepara sus ventas que llevara por la mañana a vender, siempre hace variadas refacciones para poder vender más, y por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia en productos comestibles para la elaboracion de refacciones.

Regina es vendedora de ropa deportiva.
texts.en:
Vicenta is a member of Dúo La Bonita.  She is from Sumpango, Sac.  She is married and a mother.

Vicenta, the representative of the duo, is the mother of five adult children.  She earns her living selling refreshments and tortillas in a factory located a few kilometers from her house and also sells new clothes from her home.  Every day she gets up at 3 in the morning to be able to begin preparing her things to sell in the morning.  She always makes a variety of refreshments so she can sell more.  She is requesting this loan to buy the ingredients to make her refreshments.  

Regina sells athletic clothing.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients to make her refreshments.

loans.name: Maria Rosario

texts.es: Maria Rosario, de 48 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles de consumo diario desde hace 2 años, esta contenta porque tiene la oportunidad de solicitar este credito para la compra de productos comestibles de granos basicos y asi surtir su negocio´y tener mas variedad.
texts.en: Maria Rosario, is 48, married, and has 2 children.  She has been selling food products from her store for 2 years.  She is happy because she has the opportunity to request this loan in order to buy food products such as basic grains and stock her store to have more variety.

loans.use: to buy food products such as basic grains and stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Los Tres Girasoles Group

texts.es: Es un grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras exitosas, una de ellas es Jeaneth tiene 36 años de edad, soltera con un hijo , desde hace 10 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y repostería, el crédito  lo invertirá en la compra de pantalones de varón, pantalón de damas, toallas, chinelas, blusas etc. Jesica tiene 27 años y su negocio es la de una pulpería en su domicilio y María tiene 24 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de muebles.
texts.en:
This is a group made up of three successful entrepreneurs.  One of them is Jeaneth, 36.  She's single and has one child.  She has sold clothing and pastry for 10 years. 

She'll invest the loan in buying pants for men and women, towels, slippers, blouses, etc.

Jesica, 27, has a grocery store in her house and María, 24, sells furniture.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is from Clarin, in the province of Misamis Occidental. He is 26 years old and single. To make a living, Rey owns and operates a transportation service. He has had his business for three years and earns 25,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month from these activities.

Rey joined GDMPC in 2010. He is requesting a loan of 35,000 PHP, which he will use to repair his existing vehicle for better service. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to repair his existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is 23 years old and single. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a transportation service in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 3 years and earns 8,000 PHP every month.

She joined GDMPC in the year 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase spare parts and new tires for better service. She  plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and new tires for better service

loans.name: Adilia

texts.es: Doña Adilia de 51 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capasidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y el maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos y mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganacias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene,vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus 2 hijos, Doña adilia esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc y asi poder tener mejores ganacias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en:
Adilia, age 51, has been farming for several years.  This has given her the capacity and the knowledge needed to take care of her crops.  Her main crops are corn and sorghum.  She sells her crops at basic grain agencies and markets that are close to where she lives.

She uses the profits she gets from her sales to help with the expenses that her family has.  She lives in her own house with her husband and two children.

Adilia is requesting a new loan in order to be able to buy agricultural supplies that will help her sow her crops.  She will buy things like manure, seeds, and fertilizers, etc.  This way she will have better income, and she will continue helping with the household expenses without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like manure, fertilizers, and seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años siembra frijol y maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con sus padres y hermanos en casa propia. El esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener un mejor estabilidad economicay seguir ayudando a sus padres como siempre lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
This client has been farming for 10 years. He plants beans and corn, and sales from the harvest cover his household expenses. He is responsible, honest, and hardworking. He lives with his parents and siblings in their own house.

He has applied for a loan to buy supplies for the harvest because his earnings will not cover these expenses. This way, he will have more income and greater financial stability. He will keep helping his parents, as he has always done.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Roselito

texts.en:
Roselito is 38 years old, married with 1 child. He lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

He owns and operates a transportation service in the local community to earn a living. He has been in this business for over two years and earns 20,000 PHP every month. 

He has been a member of GDMPC since 2009 and now he has requested a loan of 35,000 PHP to purchase spare parts and new tires for a better service. 

He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and new tires for a better service

loans.name: Porferia

texts.en:
Porferia is 53 years old, married, with four children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Porferia is borrowing PHP 25,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Porferia has been farming vegetables for 20 years and also earns additional income from rag-making and coconut-grinding. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to purchase a lot where she will build a house for her family and business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
A retailing business is the primary source of income for Marivic. She has been in this business for ten years. She is now 44 years old and is happily married to Joel. The couple is thankful because they had been blessed with four children. 

As of now, Marivic wants to re-stock her sari-sari store. In this regard, she is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 to buy canned goods, beverages, noodles, biscuits, and condiments to sell. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested to further develop her business. Marivic hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, beverages, noodles, biscuits, and condiments to sell.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
This is Anabel, 36, a resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Renato, a security officer, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Anabel operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

Anabel is requesting a Php 50,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Anabel hopes to eventually have a grocery store, and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Van

texts.en:
Van was born in 1969. She has two sons who are workers. Her husband makes aluminum frame glass doors. He earns 4,500,000 VND per month. 

Van raises chickens and grows rice to earn a living. Her income is about 2,000,000 VND. She has done this job for 20 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 

Van has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 6,758,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,066,000 VND to buy feed for her chickens. She wants to use the profit to enlarge her chicken farm.

loans.use: to buy feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Mehrafruz

texts.ru: Мехрафруз позитивная, добродушная, ответственная женщина в возрасте 34 лет. Она замужем и  имеет троих прекрасных детей. Её муж хороший семьянин и добрый отец для своих детей. Он работает мастером в автосервисе и имеет средний доход. До замужества Мехрафруз училась в медицинском колледже и получила для себя знания и опыт в сфере медицинского обслуживания. Но после того, как она вышла замуж и появились дети, Мехрафруз пришлось оставить свою профессию и заниматься своими детьми и домашним хозяйством. Но для того, чтобы иметь дополнительный доход в семье она начала своё маленькое дело - откармливание скота. Этим она может заниматься, находясь дома. От откармливания и продажи скота она получает хорошую прибыль, что влияет на экономическое положение и качество жизни её семьи. Сейчас у неё в наличии есть  несколько  голов крупно рогатого  скота, но она хочет чтобы её бизнес расширялся и приносил больше дохода, потому что сейчас она думает о будущем своих детей и мечтает о том, чтобы они получили хорошее образование и профессию. Но вместе с тем, что она занимается откормом скота, также дополнительно у себя дома она предоставляет медицинские услуги людям, соседям за определённую плату. Она оказывает скорую помощь, делает  уколы, ставит капельницы и многое другое. И сейчас Мехрафруз хочет получить в ООО МДО Арванд кредит для покупки одного крупно рогатого скота для  дальнейшей реализации своего малого бизнеса и заранее благодарит за поддержку!
texts.en: Mehrafruz is a positive, kindhearted and responsible woman. She is 34 years old and has three wonderful children. Her husband is a good family man and kind father to his children. He works as a master mechanic in an automotive shop and has a decent salary. Before she married Mehrafruz attended medical college and has a degree in medical services. But after her children were born Mehrafruz left her profession to take care of the kids and the household. However, to earn more money for her family she has started a small business raising cattle. She is able to take care of her animals without leaving home and earns a good profit from livestock sales, which influences her family's the economic situation and quality of life. Currently Mehrafruz has a few heads of cattle but wants to expand her business and her profits. She also offers medical services in her home to her neighbors. She can administer urgent care, perform injections and insert IVs as well as other medical services. Savings from her businesses will allow her to improve the future of her children as Mehrafruz wants them to receive good education and good professions.
